title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in million liters, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Production in million liters has increased over the Year.

Production in million liters is roughly constant from 2007 to 2012, rapidly increasing from 2012 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2017, and lastly roughly increasing from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Max Production in million liters about 463.0 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Production in million liters about 70.0 was recorded at Year 2007
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in million liters, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2007 to 2012.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
